name: Penguin Drama: stairway to love
description:
IN THE ARCTIC, PENGUIN DRAMA UNFOLDS...
(In the arctic, no one can hear you scream)

When a penguin falls in love with a penguinette, nothing will stand in his way. Not even the mightiest of mountains!
One mega jump at a time, he will reach platforms and defeat the polar environment.

Penguinette was searching for food and for a bit of me time to reflect about their lives in the arctic. She wanted to move, and find another nest, but she truly loved Penguin. She feigned searching for rare fish in the mountain's inner lake and left Penguin for what she called "a short break". In truth, she was getting tired of this polar setting.

Penguin is lovable, but not the brightest of the pack. It took him a while to realize that she had gone for more than a day. He began to panic and called her name throughout the ice floe. He braved white bears, angry sharks and imaginary penguins sliding through the aurora borealis. Finally, he arrived at the foot of the great mountain.

And here kids, things got serious.

As a response to his calls, he heard her muffled voice coming from great heights. She called out to him, too scared to come down, afraid of sliding to oblivion.

Bravely, Penguin began to jump from ice platform to ice platform, fighting the winds, the falling snow and his own fear. For nothing would stop him from reaching his beloved. Happy thoughts, happy feet, our little hero did as his idol, pengu, had done many times. He rose to the occasion!

HELP PENGUIN REACH THE TOP, FIND HIS ONE TRUE LOVE, AND REMIND HER WHY SHE MARRIED SUCH A DOPE :)

Penguin Drama is a game for kids and adults alike ! It's a disney styled story of love and challenges to fulfill a penguin's destiny. Reach his loved one.

So get your polar gear on, and get ready to jump!
